mapper.select: WITH PROD_VIEW AS ( SELECT PROD_BUYER, COUNT(PROD_ID) PROD_COUNT FROM PROD GROUP BY PROD_BUYER ), BUYER_VIEW AS ( SELECT * FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON(BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) ) SELECT BUYER_ID ,BUYER_NAME ,BUYER_LGU ,BUYER_ADD1 ,BUYER_ADD2 ,BUYER_CHARGER ,BUYER_COMTEL ,LPROD_NM ,NVL(PROD_COUNT, 0) PROD_COUNT FROM BUYER_VIEW LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_VIEW ON (BUYER_ID = PROD_BUYER)

SELECT BUYER_ID ,BUYER_NAME ,BUYER_LGU ,BUYER_BANK ,BUYER_BANKNO ,BUYER_BANKNAME ,BUYER_ZIP ,BUYER_ADD1 ,BUYER_ADD2 ,BUYER_COMTEL ,BUYER_FAX ,BUYER_MAIL ,BUYER_CHARGER ,BUYER_TELEXT ,LPROD_NM ,PROD_ID ,PROD_NAME ,PROD_COST ,PROD_PRICE ,PROD_MILEAGE FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON (LPROD_GU = BUYER_LGU) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD ON(PROD_BUYER = BUYER_ID) WHERE BUYER_ID = #{buyerId}
